content.question: Which of the following transactions will be included in the calculation of Country X's Gross Domestic Product <math alttext="open parenthesis, G D P, close parenthesis" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>(GDP)</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> in 2020?

choices.label: The exchange of a used automobile for a used boat
The purchase of new construction equipment
Social Security checks received by retirees
Carrots grown in a householdâ€™s backyard and consumed by the family

content.answer: The purchase of new construction equipment

unit.text: 2: Economic Indicators and the Business Cycle

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Identify an economic concept, principle, or model illustrated by an example.
